def findSub(string):
    mySet=[]
    for start in range(len(string)):
        for end in range(start,len(string)):
            mySet.append(string[start:end+1])
    return mySet

tc=input()
while tc:
    tc-=1
    string=raw_input()
    mySet=findSub(string)
    flag=1
    for letter in mySet:
        if letter[::-1] not in mySet:
            print "NO"
            flag=0
            break
    if flag:
        print "YES"
